notes: May appear with [[The Destruction]] and the [[World Devourer]] in the [[Heart of Destruction Quest]] if a [[Charged Disruption]] is not killed fast enough.
name: Overcharged Disruption
strategy: This creature has a lot of health, so killing it can be a complicated task during the boss fights. The best strategy is doing everything to avoid it spawning, i.e. killing the [[Disruption]]s as fast as possible. If they do spawn you will have to either ignore it and keep killing the boss and [[Disruption]]s or spend some time killing it.
